name: Skeletal System
specification: Life-size plastic model with labeled bones and movable joints to demonstrate articulation.
function: Provides a detailed representation of human bone structure useful for study and teaching purposes.
usage: Use as a hands-on tool for anatomical learning; manipulate joints gently to observe movement; handle carefully to avoid damage.
maintenance: Dust gently with a soft cloth; store upright in a safe place to prevent distortion.
warning: Avoid rough handling or dropping, as this could break or crack delicate connections.
